title: Away from the Manger
description: A collection of three short Christmas stories:"The Christmas Rose" - a widow receives a surprise gift... on her first Christmas by herself. A story of unchanging love that reaches beyond the passage of time. "Christmas Cashier" - a glimpse into the inner thoughts of holiday shoppers as they share their views on Christmas with a local cashier. "Away From The Manger" - an annual Christmas Eve service takes a surprising turn when someone goes after the church's Baby Jesus.
author: Ashley Elizabeth Tetzlaff
